+[application.cpu-time-hot-methods]
+label = "Java Methods that Execute the Most from CPU Time Sampler"
+table = "COLUMN 'Method', 'Samples', 'Percent'
+         FORMAT none, none, normalized
+         SELECT stackTrace.topFrame AS T, COUNT(*), COUNT(*)
+         FROM CPUTimeSample GROUP BY T LIMIT 25"
+
+[application.cpu-time-failed-samples]
+label = "Failed CPU Time Samples"
+table = "COLUMN 'Failed?', 'Samples', 'Percent'
+         FORMAT none, none, normalized
+         SELECT failed, COUNT(*), COUNT(*)
+         FROM CPUTimeSample
+         GROUP BY failed"
+
+[application.cpu-time-biased-samples]
+label = "Biased CPU Time Samples"
+table = "COLUMN 'Biased?', 'Samples', 'Percent'
+         FORMAT none, none, normalized
+         SELECT biased, COUNT(*), COUNT(*)
+         FROM CPUTimeSample
+         GROUP BY biased"
+
+[application.cpu-time-lost-samples]
+label = "CPU Time Samples lost because of internal throttling"
+table = "COLUMN 'Lost samples'
+         FORMAT none
+         SELECT SUM(O.lostSamples)
+         FROM CPUTimeSampleLoss as O"
+
